fever
back tenderness
antibiotic therapy
• enhancing epidural collection lumbar spinal canal.
• dural sac is compressed.
• dural thickening present.
• collection is primarily posterior in location.
• paraspinal and psoas muscles abscesses.
spine, epidural abscess
• epidural hematoma
• epidural abscess
• metastatic disease
40 year old drug abuser.  1 month history of back pain.  mrsa positive blood cultures
